title: Tim Cook Tells Dua Lipa About Apple’s Internal Culture, AI, Vision Pro, Working at Apple, and More in Candid Interview
description: In a recent interview with British pop superstar Dua Lipa, Apple CEO Tim Cook shared his perspectives on a wide variety of topics, including Apple’s approach to technology, environmental strategies, and the future of AI. The conversation also touched on Cook’s personal experiences and Apple’s internal culture. Apple’s Internal Culture and Diversity Cook emphasized Apple’s […]
